Texts.Eng:
A race of clever colonial foxes. 

Diet: Omnivore, can eat raw meat

^orange;Perks^reset;:
+^green;15^reset;% speed and jump
^green;10^reset;% fall damage reduction 
^green;Resist: 20^reset;% Cold, Fire and Electric 
Immune: L1 Cold, L1 Heat, Slush, Snow, Jungle tiles, Sandstorms.
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
^green;15^reset;% Protection on forest, jungle and plains type biomes. 
-^red;15^reset;% Health and Damage on Alien/Fungus/Proto/Penumbra/Toxic/Radioactive worlds
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
Shortsword,Shortspear,Spear,Rapier: +^green;10^reset;% Damage
Sniper Rifle: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance 
 
^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
-^red;40^reset;% Poison, -^red;20^reset;% Shadow , Radiation and Cosmic
-^red;50^reset;% Knockback Resist
